[Oportunidade 1]
Oportunidade: Quality Assurance Engineer

Sobre a vaga
In Short
Arke is searching for a Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer in Brazil, either CLT or PJ. The key focus of the QA Engineer is to develop a quality process focused across multiple projects. The QA Engineer will collaborate closely and work in a cross-functional team to deliver digital transformation by using nonconventional thinking to get into the mindset of how product owners and end users view the product.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing
The QA Engineer is responsible for Quality Assurance Testing, User Acceptance Testing, scheduling, coordinating and management of releases across different product categories. These releases can include product feature updates, bug fixes, new feature enhancements, and all other aspects introduced to the product line. This role is also responsible for quality review of various applications and includes creating test plans and strategy, test cases in partnership with developers, business analysts and project managers which are used to shape and verify code and check conformance to business and system requirements. The role relies upon manual testing tools and test automation as a new process within Arke.

What We‚Äôd Love to See
3+ years quality assurance/manual testing experience on public facing web applications (desktop, tablet and mobile)
3+ years of web project experience
2+ years of automated testing experience (Cypress or Selenium)
2+ years of API testing experience (Swagger, Postman, or automated)
Previous release management experience
Ability to work within an Agile or Waterfall environment, including writing or assisting with story creation and acceptance criteria
Able to exercise independent judgment and act on it
Experience using Office 365, including Outlook, Teams, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio (or other diagramming tool like Miro)
Experience managing project requirements/test results within Agile tools (i.e., Jira or Azure DevOps)
Preferred experience using test tools, including BrowserStack or LambdaTest
Preferred experience with testing on Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and Content Management Systems (CMS) systems both from the user side and admin side
ADA & WCAG Compliance testing experience preferred
Preferred proven experience writing automated test scripts for functional and integration testing
Knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Front-end Frameworks (i.e., Next JS and React) preferred

Soft Skills
Able to exercise independent judgment and act on it
Excellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills
Logical and efficient, with keen attention to detail
Highly self-motivated and directed
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressure
Strong customer service orientation
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment
Ability to maintain positive and productive working relationships with stakeholders, peers, and leadership

Nice To Have
Bachelor‚Äôs degree from an accredited college/university, with a preferred concentration in Business, Management Information Systems, or Accounting

Who We Are
Arke is a full-service experience design and technology consultancy that believes in providing more ‚Äì much more. We change the way brands approach digital transformation and create defining moments to better connect brands with their customers. Arke‚Äôs core values are the soul of who we are and shape everything we do. We are authentically unique, operate with high standards, and love what we do
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Oportunidade 2]
Oportunidade: Senior Data Scientist, Brazil

Sobre a vaga
We partner with the world‚Äôs most valuable brands to build digital solutions that transform businesses. As a digital native, we bring a 29-year track record of accelerating business impact through complete and scalable digital solutions. With a global presence of 6,000+ professionals in strategy, research, data science, design, and engineering, we unlock top-line growth, improve customer experience and drive operational efficiency.

General Description
We are looking for a Data Scientist who specializes in recommendation systems to help us build a new algorithm to recommend products based on the purchase history of customers and various other factors. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of machine learning, data analysis, and statistical modeling, with a proven track record of developing and deploying recommendation systems at scale.
Responsabilities:
Algorithm Development: Design, develop, and implement recommendation algorithms for product suggestions based on customer purchase history and other relevant data.
Data Analysis: Analyze large datasets to uncover patterns, trends, and insights that drive the recommendation engine.
Model Training: Train and validate machine learning models to ensure high accuracy and performance of the recommendation system.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams including engineering, product management, and marketing to integrate the recommendation system into our product offerings.
Performance Monitoring: Monitor and optimize the performance of the recommendation system, making adjustments and improvements as needed.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of algorithms, models, and processes.
Requirements for this challenge:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, or a related field.
Solid experience in data science with a focus on recommendation systems and international projects.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
Strong understanding of algorithms and data structures.
Experience with recommendation system techniques such as collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid methods.
Must-have experience with Spark.
Knowledge of frameworks and tools like Apache Mahout, Surprise, and LightFM.
Experience working with machine learning on Databricks.
Experience with SQL and other tools to exploit data for a clear, strategic vision.
Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to work with complex datasets.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, with the ability to present technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Team Player: Ability to work effectively in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.
Nice to Have
Familiarity with A/B testing and other validation techniques.
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and their machine learning services.
Experience with MLOps practices, including model deployment, monitoring, and automated workflows using Azure DevOps, and Databricks.
Our benefits:
- Health plan and dental plan;
- Meal allowances;
- Childcare assistance;
- Extended parental leave;
- Gympass
- Annual profit-sharing distribution;
- Life insurance;
- Partnership with an online mental health platform;
- CI&T University;
- Discount Club;
- Support Program: legal; financial; physiotherapy; psychological guidance; nutritionist and more;
- Pregnancy course and responsible parenthood;
- Partnership with online course platforms
- Platform for language learning;
- And many others.
#Midsenior


CI&T is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate and appreciate the diversity of our CI&Ters‚Äô identities and lived experiences. We are committed to building, promoting, and retaining a diverse, inclusive, and equitable company and culture focused on creating a better tomorrow.
At CI&T, we recognize that innovation and transformation only happen in diverse, inclusive, and safe work environments. Our teams are most impactful when people from all backgrounds and experiences collaborate to share, create, and hear ideas.
Before applying for our opportunities take a look at Conflict of Interest Policy on website.
We strongly encourage candidates from diverse and underrepresented communities to apply for our vacancies.

[Oportunidade 3]
Oportunidade: Especialista de Arquitetura de Dados

Sobre a vaga
Company Description

A Serasa Experian √© a primeira e a maior Datatech do Brasil. [Oportunidade 4]
Oportunidade: Senior Backend Engineer in Sustainable Agtech & AI @ Adaviv -an MIT Spinoff

Sobre a vaga
Where would you work?
Adaviv, spun off from MIT, offers the world's first farmer-centric AI platform for greenhouse and controlled farms. Our AI mentor empowers farm managers and upskills workers, providing real-time insights to enhance productivity, retention, and operational efficiency. Based at Greentown Labs, Somerville, MA, Adaviv serves leading greenhouse and indoor farms globally. We boost yields by up to 31% and cut losses by 45%, saving managers hours each week for critical decisions like worker feedback, treatment optimization, and crop planning. We're growing and seeking passionate, mission-driven individuals with a growth mindset to join our team.

What would you be doing?
As a Senior Backend Application Engineer at Adaviv, you will be working with our engineering team as well as Product Lead, CTO, Frontend engineers and our UI/UX designers to advance our CI/CD pipeline and implement new data pipelines and APIs for our beta and production-level mobile and web apps towards supporting a growing pool of clients across the Americas and building game-changing products for sustainable Agriculture. You will work on building, maintaining and improving our cloud tech stack. You will also work with the software team to create and maintain an optimized data schema for these new features using google cloud and AWS infrastructure.

You‚Äôll have the opportunity to make a big impact on both the company and our customers. We bring design-to-value thinking to all dimensions of our product development and believe in designing highly intuitive experiences that make our end customer‚Äôs job easier. You'll be in charge of quickly improving performance and developing high-impact features, while also keeping one eye on scalability and security of backend services as we grow. At Adaviv, we value continuous learning and adaptability, encouraging you to explore new technologies and methodologies in our fast-paced environment.

We thrive on cross-functional collaboration and communication, with our engineers working closely with product leads, designers, and front-end developers to deliver seamless solutions. For example, we involve engineers in customer workshops and are highly collaborative as we design and refine features like our AI-powered insight delivery.

Who are we looking for?
We are seeking a passionate individual with 3+ years of engineering experience in industrial production settings, a proven track record of consistently achieving engineering milestones and KPIs and a can-do-will-do mindset to build and grow with our company at a fast, but rewarding pace. One of your super powers is your ability to quickly turn business requirements into high quality implementations of backend application services that support our mobile and web-based apps, while collaborating and communicating effectively with our front-end engineers and UI/UX designer. It would be necessary for this role to have excellent communication skills.

Agile software development is fundamental to your work and you possess a solid toolset for API and data pipeline/analytics development. You keep the end-user front of mind and will help us cultivate empathy for our customers and for fellow team members.

Degree Requirement:

B.Sc or M.Sc in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a relevant field (not a must but strongly preferred).

Required Skills and Qualifications:

5+ years experience in back-end/API software development in an industrial setting (production level contribution).
5+ years industry experience developing, deploying, and maintaining APIs, relational databases and data pipelines is a must.
Expertise in in one of the programming languages used to develop cloud tech stack for backend services, savvy in useful libraries, tools, platforms, and development environments that are widely used.
Experience building and deploying APIs that are used commercially.
Expertise in agile and continuous software development.
Strong background in Test-Driven Development and ability to independently carry out all phases of a software development process.
Demonstrated aptitude in current state-of-the-art developments of cloud applications and rapid development frameworks.

Preferred but not Required Skills:

Fluency in Python, Typescript
Dual degrees in relevant fields of CS, Software Engineering, Design, math etc.
Experience building software products for traditional industries like agriculture, manufacturing, supply chain, energy or adjacent fields.
Familiarity with User-Centric Design (UI/UX theory) and first-hand experience surveying customer feedback.
Full-stack development experience (Python, AWS ecosystem - data orchestration tools)
Fundamental knowledge of data engineering and algorithm principles

Additional Details:

This role requires full-time engagement.
Remote or hybrid remote-in-person flexible.
Annual salary. We offer an opportunity for equity ownership, with a clear vesting schedule and the potential for significant growth as the company scales.

Final Words. 
Principles of sustainability are at our core. We value integrity, excellence, hard work, respect, and collaboration. You'll operate as a member of a fun, diverse team (6 nationalities!) and work both independently and collaboratively. We promote and foster diversity of people and ideas, while cultivating empathy for our customers and team members.

We are committed to your professional growth, offering access to conferences, workshops, and continued education support. Adaviv also provides flexible remote or hybrid work options to help you balance your professional and personal life effectively.

Want to be a part of our team? If Adaviv sounds like the type of company you‚Äôd like to be a part of and want to help us change how we grow food and medicines for the better, then please apply!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Oportunidade 5]
Oportunidade: Coordenador(a) de Engenharia de Dados

Sobre a vaga

A √°rea de Digital do Grupo Fleury desempenha um papel crucial na identifica√ß√£o das necessidades dos usu√°rios e das √°reas de neg√≥cios, mapeando a experi√™ncia, e na constru√ß√£o e sustenta√ß√£o de produtos digitais alinhados √† jornada do usu√°rio. A pessoa que assumir essa posi√ß√£o ser√° respons√°vel por criar solu√ß√µes baseadas na modelagem de quaisquer estruturas de dados, explorando t√©cnicas atuais para constru√ß√£o de robustos modelos de dados que apoiem os analistas e cientistas no desenvolvimento de projetos. Modelar problemas complexos, definir requisitos de sistema e garantir a qualidade e integridade dos dados.

Principais atividades:
Gerir, mentorar e guiar engenheiros de dados juniores, plenos e seniors.

Mentorar e guiar engenheiros de dados juniores, plenos e seniors.
Definir estrat√©gias de engenharia de dados e moldar a dire√ß√£o t√©cnica.

Buscamos um profissional que apresente: 
Necess√°rio gradua√ß√£o completa;
Necess√°rio experi√™ncia na lideran√ßa de squads como Tech Leader;

O que esperamos?

Modelo de trabalho: Remoto
